title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Language Learning Using an E-Learning System Integrated with Instructional Design Models

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and digital learning tool application experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can achieve weekly learning objectives at an 80% or higher success rate through an e-learning system based on instructional design (ID) models.
Learners can submit artifacts demonstrating the application of language proficiency to real-world contexts through project-based assessments.
Learners can establish and implement self-directed learning plans using ID model-integrated tools within the LMS.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
